name: beautiful_bridge_railway_Cargoships
title: Beautiful Bridge Railway for Cargoships
author: kapaer, GeneralTank
description: Add some beautiful bridge-rails (wood, iron, stone-brick) that can be placed on water, and change default Big-electric-pole (now optional as Cargoships has it's own Floating Power poles) and rail-signals to be placeable on water. Also adds Wyrrrd's Recipe Fix that changes the recipe based on how other mods change the base rail recipe.
